title: Missing From Me
description:
One mistake. Four years of regret. 
A second chance worth fighting for.
When I traded one dream for another, she was the price. My Anna. But I never forgot her. Never let go. And no amount of drumming could drown out my love for her. Her music is my head. Still...Always...And when I see her again, it's so clear. Anna is mine. She'll always be mine. I just have to convince her.Missing From Me is an epic story about second chances, redemption, undying love, and music. Because every great romance deserves a soundtrack.
author: Jayne Frost
